name: movary
tagline: A self-hosted movie tracking and statistics platform
description: Movary is a self-hosted movie tracking and stats platform using the Trakt API. It allows users to track watched movies, generate charts, and explore statistics with a self-hosted database and UI.

features.title: Real-Time Sync
features.description: Sync your watch history with Trakt to maintain consistent data across platforms and services

features.title: Analytics Dashboard
features.description: View charts showing movies watched over time, favorite genres, and viewing patterns

features.title: REST API
features.description: Access metadata including posters, descriptions, and cast information from integrated APIs

features.title: Watchlist Management
features.description: Maintain a list of movies you want to watch with priority sorting and filtering options

features.title: Year In Review
features.description: Generate annual summaries showing total movies watched, top genres, and viewing milestones

features.title: Self-Hosted
features.description: Keep your viewing history and preferences on your own server for complete privacy control
